name: Full Name
create_user_account_desc: Do you want to create a user account for this employee?
select_permissions_desc: Select the permissions this user will have:
admin_full_access: Admin has full access to all modules
owner_full_access: Owner has full access to all modules
view_all_data_note: Note: With View permission, this user can view data entered by others as well.
module_description: Manage employee information, departments, salaries, and permissions with the Employees module. Digitize your human resources management and streamline your business processes.
select_employee_to_manage_permissions: Select the employee whose permissions you want to manage
no_employees_found_subtitle: You can add a new employee using the relevant option from the menu.
permissions_management_info: You can manage employee permissions from this screen. You can edit permissions for employees with user accounts.
verification_settings_desc: Manage TC Identity and IMEI verification settings
tc_verification_desc: Automatically verify when TC identity number is entered in employee form
imei_verification_desc: Automatically verify when IMEI number is entered in employee form
verification_info: When these features are enabled, the relevant fields in the employee form will automatically perform verification. If disabled, they will work as regular form fields.
form_configuration_info: Select form template or use default
manage_templates: Go to settings to manage form templates
package_desc: Select package for this owner. Staff permissions are determined by owner's package.
staff_package_info: Staff does not have a package. Staff permissions are determined by owner's package.
permission_group_desc: Select a group to quickly assign permissions (optional)
